summary: Restaurant website with home, menu, about, and contact pages
architectural_notes: Menu prices should be easily editable
Navigation between Home, Menu, About, and Contact pages
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Appetizing restaurant hero banner showing diverse fresh food dishes in warm lighting (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Elegant food icon for main dishes section with bowl and steam (main-dishes-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Fast food icon showing burger and fries in playful style (fast-food-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Refreshing drinks icon with glass and citrus elements (drinks-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a home page displaying restaurant welcome message 'Welcome to Our Restaurant üçΩÔ∏è', tagline 'We serve fresh, tasty, and affordable food every day', description about being a perfect place for family, friends, and food lovers, using fresh ingredients and cooking with care, with service highlights: dine in or take away, friendly service, clean and comfortable environment, and a call-to-action 'Visit us today and enjoy delicious food!'

Create a menu page with three sections: Main Dishes (Chicken Biryani $5, Beef Curry $6, Fried Rice $4, Chicken Burger $4), Fast Food (Pizza $7, French Fries $2, Sandwich $3), and Drinks (Cold Drinks $1, Fresh Juice $2, Water $0.5), with all prices editable by admin

Create an About Us page describing the restaurant as a local restaurant serving the community with love and care, with goals to provide fresh and quality food, good taste at a fair price, and friendly customer service, including the message 'We believe good food brings people together' and 'Thank you for choosing our restaurant'

Create a contact page displaying address placeholder 'Your Street Name, Your Area, Your City', phone number placeholder '+880 1XXXXXXXXX', opening hours 'Everyday: 10:00 AM ‚Äì 10:00 PM', and email placeholder 'yourrestaurant@email.com', with all contact information editable by admin
Implement navigation to allow users to switch between Home, Menu, About Us, and Contact pages

Design a warm, inviting visual theme for a family-friendly restaurant with a cohesive color palette using warm earth tones (amber, terracotta, cream), readable typography, and layout that emphasizes food imagery and hospitality

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with restaurant welcome, services, and call-to-action
Menu page with main dishes, fast food, and drinks sections with pricing
About Us page describing restaurant values and goals
Contact page with address, phone, hours, and email
